subject: Simsonn Plus X w/Baseplate question
description_text:
Hi,

I have the Logitech Playseat Challenge w/the bolted pedal base not the velcro.  I just ordered the Simsonn Plus X w/Baseplate and wondering how best to mount it on the seat rig?

Thanks,

Ihab

conversations.body_text: Hi Ihab Rashad,     You can refer to the dimensions of the pedal base in the product details, as well as the base plate provided in the attachments for comparison.

Hi,

I’m not too happy with the brake pedal as there isn’t enough of a spring engaging when pressed even with the different elastomers. 

Is there a way to have more spring feedback with more travel?
Hi Ihab Rashad,     To increase the pedal travel, you need to remove the 10mm spacer inside the black brake spring. This will extend the pedal’s travel.
